summary: A desperate love story between two young girls of extremely different social backgrounds who, unable to find a place for their love in the world they live in, are pushed to commit a crime.
cast: Inés Efron|Mariela Vitale|Pep Munné|Diego Velázquez|Carlos Bardem|Arnaldo André|Ailín Salas|Sandra Guida|Julián Doregger|Paloma Contreras|Darío Valenzuela|Jerónimo Perassolo|Marco Vera|Sergio Lapegüe|Pedro Di Salvia|Vando Villamil|María Celeste Ortega|Loren Acuña|Jorge Booth|Coral Gabaglio|Verónica Piaggio|Irene Almus|Santiago Caamaño|Adriana Mascialino|Fabián Rendo|Leticia Bacci|Juan Carrasco|Odón Morán López|Silvina Sabaté|Agustina Barach|Josefina Cuneo|María Florencia Morrone|Luis Sabatini|Mario Barroso|Liliana Cuomo|Iván Moschner|Virginia Sarmoria
keywords: two women in bath tub|lesbian romance|title same as book|adaptation directed by original author|violence
title: El niño pez
